title: Mrs. Meyer's Hand Soap Refill, Made with Essential Oils, Biodegradable Formula, Basil, 33 fl. oz
description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day hand soaps are specifically made to clean and freshen hands without over drying, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Mrs. Meyer's Basil scent has a cool, crisp fragrance that is uplifting & grounding, familiar & exotic - all at one time. Such an inviting herbal smell, the garden's friendly boost of green. This hardworking hand soap formula contains olive oil, aloe vera, and essential oils, and thoughtfully chosen ingredients that clean and freshen hands. Made without parabens, phthalates or animal-derived ingredients and always a cruelty-free formula soap. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as Dish Soap and Multi-Surface Cleaner. Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.
